title: Google Analytics Data API v1beta - DimensionMetadata Type
description: Explains a dimension and provides information about its usage

apiName.description: The API name of the dimension

uiName.description: The display name of the dimension in the UI

description.description: Description of how this dimension is used and calculated

deprecatedApiNames.description: The names of dimensions that have been replaced by this dimension

customDefinition.description: True if the dimension is a custom dimension for this property
